item.title: New Container: Medusa
item.description: We have released a new container for Medusa! Medusa is an automatic Video Library Manager for TV Shows. It watches for new episodes of your favorite shows, and when they are posted it does its magic.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Medusa!

Medusa is an automatic Video Library Manager for TV Shows. It watches for new episodes of your favorite shows, and when they are posted it does its magic.
